description: MainActivity.kt defines the main activity for an Android app that displays a palette of colors, supports copying color codes, toggling between light and dark themes, and generating new color palettes with animations.

classes.name: MainActivity
classes.description: Main activity managing the display of color palette, theme switching, and clipboard interactions.

methods.name: onCreate
methods.description: Initializes the activity, sets up views, adapters, observers, and theme switcher.

methods.name: crossfade
methods.description: Performs a fade animation to show or hide views.

methods.name: handleCopy
methods.description: Handles copying color code to clipboard and showing a Snackbar.

methods.name: submit
methods.description: Updates the adapter with a new list of colors.

methods.name: onCreateViewHolder
methods.description: Creates view holders for color tiles.

methods.name: onBindViewHolder
methods.description: Binds color data to the view holder.

methods.name: getItemCount
methods.description: Returns the number of color items.

methods.name: bind
methods.description: Binds a color to the color tile views, sets accessibility descriptions, and click listeners.
